message:
‎"If someone is in the store for a long time, they're usually up to no good. It's a convenience store...people want to get in and get out as fast as they can," says Les.

‎"On Saturday, St. Paul police say 50 kids swarmed a Holiday store on Wabasha, a so-called mob theft or mob robbery. They stormed in together, their numbers overwhelming & just started stealing."

http://www.kare11.com/news/article/909497/396/Mob-robbers-hit-convenience-stores-in-St-Paul
